MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY11 postcode area of Whittington, affecting properties in Penybryn Avenue, Ellesmere road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty piece of equipment on the electrical cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15PM on 21ST December 2020
